messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I recently placed an order with you, order number W9300146, and I would like to change the Desk Lamp in that order to the cheapest Desk Lamp you have available. Also, if there is any price difference, I would like that amount to be given to me as a gift card. Could you help me with this? And also, could you tell me how much I would get back in total?

message.content: Hello! I recently placed an order with you, order number W9300146, and I would like to change the Desk Lamp in that order to the cheapest Desk Lamp you have available. Also, if there is any price difference, I would like that amount to be given to me as a gift card. Could you help me with this? And also, could you tell me how much I would get back in total?
